00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Threading;
00025 using System.Collections;
00026 
00027 using Niry;
00028 using Niry.Utils;
00029 using Niry.Network;
00030 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00031 
00032 using NyFolder;
00033 using NyFolder.GUI;
00034 using NyFolder.Utils;
00035 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00036 using NyFolder.GUI.Glue;
00037 using NyFolder.PluginLib;
00038 
00039 namespace NyFolder.Plugins.Talk {
00040     public static class TalkManager {
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PUBLIC Events
00043         // ============================================
00044 
00045         // ============================================
00046         // PRIVATE Members
00047         // ============================================
00048         private static NotebookViewer notebookViewer = null;
00049         private static Hashtable talkFrames = null; // [UserInfo] = TalkFrame
00050 
00051         // ============================================
00052         // PUBLIC Methods
00053         // ============================================
00054         public static void Initialize (INyFolder iNyFolder) {
00055             talkFrames = Hashtable.Synchronized(new Hashtable());
00056             notebookViewer = iNyFolder.MainWindow.NotebookViewer;
00057             notebookViewer.TabRemoved += new ObjectEventHandler(OnTalkFrameRemoved);
00058         }
00059 
00060         public static void Uninitialize() {
00061             if (talkFrames == null) return;
00062 
00063             foreach (UserInfo userInfo in talkFrames.Keys) {
00064                 TalkFrame talkFrame = talkFrames[userInfo] as TalkFrame;
00065 
00066                 // Remove Page From Notebook Viewer
00067                 notebookViewer.RemoveCustom(talkFrame);
00068             }
00069             talkFrames.Clear();
00070             talkFrames = null;
00071 
00072             // Remove Events From NotebookViewer
00073             notebookViewer.TabRemoved -= new ObjectEventHandler(OnTalkFrameRemoved);
00074             notebookViewer = null;
00075         }
00076 
00077         public static TalkFrame AddTalkFrame (UserInfo userInfo) {
00078             TalkFrame talkFrame = LookupTalkFrame(userInfo);
00079             if (talkFrame != null) return(talkFrame);
00080 
00081             // Initialize Talk Frame
00082             talkFrame = new TalkFrame(userInfo);
00083             talkFrame.Message += new StringEventHandler(OnSendMessage);
00084             talkFrames.Add(userInfo, talkFrame);
00085 
00086             notebookViewer.AppendCustom(talkFrame, userInfo.Name, 
00087                                         new Gtk.Image("TalkBubble", IconSize.Menu));
00088 
00089             return(talkFrame);
00090         }
00091 
00092         public static void InsertError (UserInfo userInfo, string error) {
00093             TalkFrame talkFrame = LookupTalkFrame(userInfo);
00094             if (talkFrame != null) talkFrame.InsertError(error);
00095         }
00096         
00097         public static void InsertStatus (UserInfo userInfo, string status) {
00098             TalkFrame talkFrame = LookupTalkFrame(userInfo);
00099             if (talkFrame != null) talkFrame.InsertStatus(status);
00100         }
00101             
00102         public static void InsertMessage (UserInfo userInfo, string message) {
00103             TalkFrame talkFrame = AddTalkFrame(userInfo);
00104             talkFrame.InsertMessage(userInfo, message);
00105         }
00106 
00107         // ============================================
00108         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00109         // ============================================
00110         private static void OnSendMessage (object sender, string message) {
00111             TalkFrame talkFrame = sender as TalkFrame;
00112             
00113             PeerSocket peer = (PeerSocket) P2PManager.KnownPeers[talkFrame.UserInfo];
00114             if (peer != null) {
00115                 SendMessage(peer, message);
00116                 Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00117                     talkFrame.InsertMessage(MyInfo.GetInstance(), message);
00118                 });
00119             } else {
00120                 Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00121                     talkFrame.InsertError("Couldn't Send Message: " + message);
00122                 });
00123             }
00124         }
00125 
00126         private static void OnTalkFrameRemoved (object o, object page) {
00127             Gtk.Application.Invoke(delegate {
00128                 if (talkFrames.ContainsValue(page) == true) {
00129                     TalkFrame talkFrame = page as TalkFrame;
00130                     talkFrame.Message -= new StringEventHandler(OnSendMessage);
00131     
00132                     PeerSocket peer = (PeerSocket) P2PManager.KnownPeers[talkFrame.UserInfo];
00133                     if (peer != null) {
00134                         UserInfo userInfo = MyInfo.GetInstance();
00135                         SendStatus(peer, userInfo.Name + " has closed the conversation Window...");
00136                     }
00137     
00138                     talkFrames.Remove(talkFrame.UserInfo);
00139                 }
00140             });
00141         }
00142 
00143         // ============================================
00144         // PRIVATE Methods
00145         // ============================================
00146         private static TalkFrame LookupTalkFrame (UserInfo userInfo) {
00147             return((TalkFrame) talkFrames[userInfo]);
00148         }
00149 
00150         private static void SendMessage (PeerSocket peer, string message) {
00151             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00152             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "msg";
00153             xmlRequest.BodyText = message;
00154             if (peer != null) peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00155         }
00156 
00157         private static void SendStatus (PeerSocket peer, string status) {
00158             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00159             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "msg";
00160             xmlRequest.BodyText = status;
00161             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("type", "status");
00162             if (peer != null) peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00163         }
00164 
00165 #if false
00166         private static void SendError (PeerSocket peer, string error) {
00167             XmlRequest xmlRequest = new XmlRequest();
00168             xmlRequest.FirstTag = "msg";
00169             xmlRequest.BodyText = error;
00170             xmlRequest.Attributes.Add("type", "error");
00171             if (peer != null) peer.Send(xmlRequest.GenerateXml());
00172         }
00173 #endif
00174     }
00175 }
